Wisdom: الْمَعْصِيَةُ هِمَّةُ الْأَرْجَاسِ
enWisdom: How bad a leash is the leash of vices!

Wisdom: الْمَعْصِيَةُ تَفْرِيطُ الْعَجَزَةِ [الْفَجَرَةِ]
enWisdom: Disobedience [to Allah] is the negligence of the vicious (or the weak)

Wisdom: اجْتِنَابُ السَّيِّئَاتِ أَوْلَى مِنِ اكْتِسَابِ الْحَسَنَاتِ
enWisdom: If you must, by all means, be pure, then purify yourselves from vices of the hearts

Wisdom: احْفَظْ بَطْنَكَ وَفَرْجَكَ مِنَ [عَنِ‏] الْحَرَامِ
enWisdom: If you must, by all means, be pure, then purify yourselves from vices of the hearts

Wisdom: الْمَغْبُونُ مَنْ بَاعَ جَنَّةً عَلِيَّةً بِمَعْصِيَةٍ دَنِيَّةٍ
enWisdom: Deceived is the one who sells a lofty Paradise for a lowly sin

Wisdom: اذْكُرُوا عِنْدَ الْمَعَاصِي ذَهَابَ اللَّذَّاتِ وَبَقَاءَ التَّبِعَاتِ
enWisdom: Be wary of the sins done in seclusion, for indeed the Witness (to it) is the Judge

Wisdom: اتَّقُوا مَعَاصِيَ الْخَلَوَاتِ فَإِنَّ الشَّاهِدَ هُوَ الْحَاكِمُ
enWisdom: Caution, caution O listener! Strive, strive O intelligent one! None can inform you like the One who is all-aware

Wisdom: الْحَذَرَ الْحَذَرَ أَيُّهَا الْمُسْتَمِعُ وَالْجِدَّ الْجِدَّ أَيُّهَا الْعَاقِلُ [الْغَافِلُ‏] وَلا يُنَبِّئُكَ مِثْلُ خَبِيرٍ
enWisdom: I am amazed at the one who avoids the food that could harm him, how does he not avoid the sin that would bring painful chastisement?!

Wisdom: الْحَذَرَ الْحَذَرَ أَيُّهَا الْمَغْرُورُ وَاللَّهِ [فَوَ اللَّهِ‏] لَقَدْ سَتَرَ حَتَّى كَأَنَّهُ قَدْ غَفَرَ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: احْذَرُوا الذُّنُوبَ الْمُوَرِّطَةَ وَالْعُيُوبَ الْمُسْخِطَةَ
enWisdom: Be careful of the sins that lead you to deep trouble the vices that bring the wrath of Allah

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَانْتِهَاكَ الْمَحَارِمِ فَإِنَّهَا شِيمَةُ الْفُسَّاقِ وَأُولِي الْفُجُورِ وَالْغَوَايَةِ
enWisdom: Refrain from desecration of the sacred, for indeed this is the practice of the wicked and the people of depravity and vice

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ أَنْ يَفْقِدَكَ رَبُّكَ عِنْدَ طَاعَتِهِ [فَلَا يَجِدَكَ‏] أَوْ يَرَاكَ عِنْدَ مَعْصِيَتِهِ فَيَمْقُتَكَ
enWisdom: Beware of being missed by your Lord in His worship, or being seen by Him in His disobedience thereby making Him displeased with you

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَالْمَعْصِيَةَ فَإِنَّ اللَّئِيمَ [الشَّقِيَ‏] مَنْ بَاعَ جَنَّةَ الْمَأْوَى بِمَعْصِيَةٍ دَنِيَّةٍ مِنْ مَعَاصِي الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Refrain from vices, for the one who sells the eternal Paradise for a vile sin from the sins of this world is indeed wretched

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ مِنْ طَلَبِ التَّوْبَةِ تَرْكُ الذَّنْبِ
enWisdom: Abandoning sins is better than seeking repentance [after sinning]

Wisdom: أَقَلُّ مَا يَلْزَمُكُمْ لِلَّهِ تَعَالَى أَنْ لَا تَسْتَعِينُوا بِنِعَمِهِ عَلَى مَعَاصِيهِ
enWisdom: The least that you must do for Allah, the Most High, is ensure that you do not use His blessings as a means of disobeying [and sinning against] Him

Wisdom: إِنَّ مِنَ النِّعْمَةِ تَعَذُّرَ الْمَعَاصِي
enWisdom: Verily the inability to commit sins is a blessing

Wisdom: إِنْ كُنْتُمْ لَا مَحَالَةَ مُتَطَهِّرِينَ فَتَطَهَّرُوا مِنْ دَنَسِ الْعُيُوبِ وَالذُّنُوبِ
enWisdom: If you purify yourselves from vices, Allah will love you

Wisdom: إِنْ كُنْتُمْ لَا مَحَالَةَ مُتَنَزِّهِينَ فَتَنَزَّهُوا عَلَى مَعَاصِي الْقُلُوبِ
enWisdom: If you must, by all means, be clean, then clean yourselves from the filth of flaws and vices

Wisdom: إِذَا أَخَذْتَ نَفْسَكَ بِطَاعَةِ اللَّهِ أَكْرَمْتَهَا وَإِنِ ابْتَذَلْتَهَا فِي مَعَاصِيهِ أَهَنْتَهَا
enWisdom: When you make your soul obey Allah you have honoured it, and if you allow it to disobey Him you have humiliated it

Wisdom: بِئْسَ [بِئْسَتِ‏] الْقِلَادَةُ قِلَادَةُ الْآثَامِ
enWisdom: In every evil act there is retribution

Wisdom: طَاعَةُ الْمَعْصِيَةِ سَجِيَّةُ الْهَلْكَى
enWisdom: I am amazed at the person who knows the severity of Allah’s retribution and [yet] he still continues being persistent [in sinning]

Wisdom: ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُ مَنْ عَصَى اللَّهَ وَأَطَاعَ الشَّيْطَانَ
enWisdom: Whoever disobeys Allah and obeys Satan has oppressed his soul

Wisdom: قَرِينُ الْمَعَاصِي رَهِينُ السَّيِّئَاتِ
enWisdom: For every evil act there is punishment

Wisdom: كُلُّ عَاصٍ مُتَأَثِّمٌ
enWisdom: Whoever disobeys Allah, his status gets lowered

Wisdom: لَيْسَ مِنْ شِيَمِ الْكَرِيمِ ادِّرَاعُ الْعَارِ
enWisdom: It is not from the traits of a noble-minded person to wear the cloak of disgrace

Wisdom: مَنْ عَصَى اللَّهَ ذَلَّ قَدْرُهُ
enWisdom: Woe be to the sinner, how ignorant he is and how much of his share he has relinquished!

Wisdom: مَنْ عَانَدَ اللَّهَ قُصِمَ
enWisdom: One who opposes Allah is crushed

Wisdom: مَنْ حَارَبَ اللَّهَ حُرِبَ
enWisdom: One who fights against Allah is ruined

Wisdom: مَنْ أَغْبَنُ مِمَّنْ بَاعَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ بِغَيْرِهِ
enWisdom: Who is more deceived than one who exchanges Allah, the Glorified, for other than Him?!

Wisdom: مَنْ أَطَاعَ هَوَاهُ بَاعَ آخِرَتَهُ بِدُنْيَاهُ
enWisdom: Whoever yields to his vain desire has sold his Hereafter for his worldly life

Wisdom: مَنْ أَهْمَلَ الْعَمَلَ بِطَاعَةِ اللَّهِ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُ
enWisdom: One who is heedless of acting in obedience to Allah has wronged himself

Wisdom: مَنْ كَثُرَ فِكْرُهُ فِي الْمَعَاصِي دَعَتْهُ إِلَيْهَا
enWisdom: One who thinks a lot about sins is pulled towards [committing] them

Wisdom: مَنْ فَسَدَ مَعَ اللَّهِ لَمْ يَصْلُحْ مَعَ أَحَدٍ
enWisdom: One who corrupts [his relationship] with Allah will not be upright with anyone

Wisdom: مَا أَشْجَعَ الْبَرِي‏ءَ وَأَجْبَنَ الْمُرِيبَ
enWisdom: How courageous the innocent one is and how timid is the suspicious one!

Wisdom: نَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنْ سَيِّئَاتِ الْعَقْلِ وَقُبْحِ الزَّلَلِ وَبِهِ نَسْتَعِينُ
enWisdom: Far be it! You have not feigned ignorance except because of what has passed before you of mistakes and sins

Wisdom: وَيْحَ الْعَاصِي مَا أَجْهَلَهُ وَعَنْ حَظِّهِ مَا أَعْدَلَهُ
enWisdom: Woe to the one who is afflicted with disobedience, deprivation and abandonment

Wisdom: وَيْلٌ لِمَنْ بُلِيَ بِعِصْيَانٍ وَحِرْمَانٍ وَخِذْلَانٍ
enWisdom: Rushing into vices causes [one to face] the chastisement of hellfire

Wisdom: لَا تُبْدِ عَنْ وَاضِحَةٍ وَقَدْ فَعَلْتَ الْأُمُورَ الْفَاضِحَةَ
enWisdom: Do not show your teeth [in laughter] while you have done such shameful deeds

Wisdom: لَا تَنْصِبَنَّ نَفْسَكَ لِحَرْبِ اللَّهِ فَلَا يَدَ لَكَ بِنَقِمَتِهِ وَلَا غِنَى بِكَ عَنْ رَحْمَتِهِ
enWisdom: Never declare war against Allah for there is no power that can protect you from His wrath and you can never be free from need for His mercy

Wisdom: لَا تَفِي لَذَّةُ الْمَعْصِيَةِ بِعِقَابِ النَّارِ
enWisdom: The pleasure of disobedience is not worth the chastisement of hellfire

Wisdom: لَا طَاعَةَ لِمَخْلُوقٍ فِي مَعْصِيَةِ الْخَالِقِ
enWisdom: There is no obedience to the creation in disobedience to the Creator
